free_text.Learning outcomes: Introduction to invertebrate and mammmalian stem cells; their role during development, tissue homeostasis and disease.
free_text.Content: Embryonic stem cells, adult stem cells including hemaotopoietic, skin, intestine, neuronal and cancer stem cells. Concepts of nuclear reprogramming, cloning, and molecular basis of self-renewal.[br/]Stem cells and therapy, emerging concept in stem cell bioengineering.

en.title: Stem cell biology and technology
en.library_recommends: • "Essentials of stem cell biology / eds.: Robert Lanza ... [et al.]". Year:2009. ISBN:978-0-12-374729-7

free_text.Contenu: Cellules souches embryonnaires, cellules souches adultes y compris les cellules hemaotopoietiques, de la peau, intestinales, cellules neuronales et cellules souches cancéreuses.[br/]Concepts de la reprogrammation nucléaire, du clonage et bases moléculaires de la régénéréscence.
free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: "Essentials of stem cell biology", J. Gearhard, B. Hogaan, D. Melton, R. Pedersen, ed.Robert Lanza. ISBN 978-0-12-088442-1 et 0-12-088442-9
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Introduction aux cellules souches des invertébrés et des mammifères; leurs rôles durant le développement, l'homéostasie des tissus et la maladie.

fr.title: Stem cell biology and technology
fr.library_recommends: • "Essentials of stem cell biology / eds.: Robert Lanza ... [et al.]". Année:2009. ISBN:978-0-12-374729-7
